sense.def:
Kar je
a priority
, moramo narediti ali rešiti čim prej.

seg.quote: Getting food was the main priority.
Factories seemed to be China's highest priority.
The waiting list contains a thousand priority cases.

sense.def:
One's priorities
so naloge ali stvari, ki jim nekdo pripisuje največji pomen.

seg.quote: We must find out the priorities of the public.

sense.def:
To have priority over other persons or things
pomeni, da je po našem mnenju neka oseba ali stvar pomembnejša kot druge, zato se z njo ukvarjamo najprej.

seg.quote: These children are given priority when day nursery places are allocated.
